Text: Oh man.. i have to thank you polifem2009 from the bottom of my heart.. Thanks to you I have managed to get Nagisa Oshima, Nobuo Nakagawa and Kon Ichikawa's best films.. Many many thanks. and keep on the great work.. It's rare to see someone so committed to putting out such great stuff.. God bless you, old son!!!
GREAT! I've looking this film for 2 years, but couldn't get it in a good quality. Thank You very much)
